item.description:
Over the past few weeks, our group has been fielding some great Trivia teams. Unfortunately, we aren't allowed to use them on Monday's.

Come out and help the food writers in the group evaluate the menu. A portion of the meal will be paid with the prizes earned. I've also been told that Tuesday's are Karaoke night and have been badgered for months to get a group together a Karaoke event.
item.name: Dinner & Karaoke @ Fatty McGee's
